Sunday Surya (the Sun): တနင်္ဂနွေ IPA: [tənɪ́ɴ ɡənwè ] (Tananganve)
Monday Soma (the Moon): တနင်္လာ IPA: [tənɪ́ɴ là ] (Tanangla)
Tuesday Mangala (Mars): အင်္ဂါ IPA: [ɪ̀ɴ ɡà ] (Angga)
Friday Shukra (Venus): သောကြာ IPA: [θaʊʔ tɕà ] (Saukra)

Sunday Surya (the Sun): တ္ၚဲ အဒိုတ် [ŋoa ətɜ̀t ] from Sans. āditya
Monday Soma (the Moon): တ္ၚဲ စန် [ŋoa cɔn] from Sans. candra
Tuesday Mangala (Mars): တ္ၚဲ အၚါ [ŋoa əŋɛ̀a] from Sans. aṅgāra
Friday Shukra (Venus): တ္ၚဲ သိုက်. [ŋoa sak] from Sans. śukra
Saturday Shani (Saturn): တ္ၚဲ သ္ၚိ သဝ် [ŋoa hɔeʔ sɔ] from Sans. śani

Sunday Surya (the Sun): ថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ [tŋaj ʔaatɨt ]
Monday Soma (the Moon): ថ្ងៃចន្ទ [tŋaj can]
Tuesday Mangala (Mars): ថ្ងៃអង្គារ [tŋaj ʔɑŋkie]
Friday Shukra (Venus): ថ្ងៃសុក្រ [tŋaj sok]
Saturday Shani (Saturn): ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ [tŋaj saʋ]

Sunday Surya (the Sun): ວັນອາທິດ [wán ʔàːtʰīt ]
Tuesday Mangala (Mars): ວັນອັງຄານ [wán ʔàŋkʰáːn]

Sunday Surya (the Sun): ဝၼ်းဢႃတိတ်ႉ IPA: [wan˦ ʔaː˩ tit˥ ]
Monday Soma (the Moon): ဝၼ်းၸၼ် IPA: [wan˦ tsan˩ ]
Tuesday Mangala (Mars): ဝၼ်းဢင်းၵၼ်း IPA: [wan˦ ʔaŋ˦ kan˦ ]
Friday Shukra (Venus): ဝၼ်းသုၵ်း IPA: [wan˦ sʰuk˦ ]
Saturday Shani (Saturn): ဝၼ်းသဝ် IPA: [wan˦ sʰaw˩ ]

Sunday Surya (the Sun): วันอาทิตย์ Wan Āthit
Monday Soma (the Moon): วันจันทร์ Wan Chan
Tuesday Mangala (Mars): วันอังคาร Wan Angkhān
Friday Shukra (Venus): วันศุกร์ Wan Suk
Saturday Shani (Saturn): วันเสาร์ Wan Sao
